commit message: Added code to allow the reference database to exist on the SD card instead of just internal storage.

Merge pull request #20 from johnerickson/master

Updated the code to allow the psrd database to exist on external storage instead of just internal.  Unfortunately this requires a permission change.
Updated the logic that determines where to toss the database. Instead of optimistically assuming that there is enough free space on external storage (when present), it checks.

Merge pull request #22 from johnerickson/master

Updated the code that determines where to store the database
